name: 1-goldenEnding
commands: Hahaha you deserved everything that happened you bastard!
We really did it!|Let's go take back the Argon Chalice and make sure nothing's wrong with it.
Ok, that's a relief. That Chalice was being used in a complex spell.|If we hadn't interuppted her, she would have gotten too powerful for us to beat.
It's a good thing we stopped her then huh?|We were really cutting it close.
Since we defeated her, everything here or what's left of it anyways should be back to normal.|We'll need to take count of who's left alive.
I'll help. I know my way with basic first aid.
It'll be tough work for the next few days.
Sir Cyrus would have been proud of us.
Thank you Teacher...for all you have done for us.
Whew! After everthing's that happened we all deserve a break!
We haven't taken a break in awhile huh?|We finally cleaned up this place. It's such a huge place.
Hey why don't we turn this place into a school?|I was thinking we could pass down Sir's teachings...|So in way he would continue to live on.
Sure!|We'll definitely be the best school ever!|It can also help those who normally can't afford education.|Just like how he helped all of us.
With the three of us here, we can all make up for each of our's weaknesses.

Slowly, we eventually transformed Kaerndal Castle into a place of learning.|Our renown has steadily increased, becoming a place known for its close knit environment.|We couldn't be any happier passing down our late mentor's teachings.
source:
#everyone survives
#speak;;this is ending 1;;;narration
multi_add_portrait;MC;Left;Schuri;MidRight;Senya;FarRight
music;goldenEpilogue
bop_portrait;Senya
speak;Senya;Hahaha you deserved everything that happened you bastard!
speak;MC;We did it!!
speak;Schuri;We really did it!|Let's go take back the Argon Chalice and make sure nothing's wrong with it.
move_unit;Schuri;8,3
speak;Schuri;Ok, that's a relief. That Chalice was being used in a complex spell.|If we hadn't interuppted her, she would have gotten too powerful for us to beat.
speak;Senya;It's a good thing we stopped her then huh?|We were really cutting it close.
speak;Schuri;Since we defeated her, everything here or what's left of it anyways should be back to normal.|We'll need to take count of who's left alive.
speak;Senya;I'll help. I know my way with basic first aid.
speak;MC;It'll be tough work for the next few days.
transition;close;1200
multi_remove_portrait;MC;Senya;Schuri
change_background;Hill
transition;open;1000
multi_add_portrait;MC;MidLeft;Schuri;Left;Senya;FarLeft
wait;1000
move_portrait;MC;MidRight
sound;forestStep
wait;250
move_portrait;MC;MidLeft
speak;Schuri;Sir Cyrus would have been proud of us.
speak;MC;Yes...he would have been.
speak;Senya;Thank you Teacher...for all you have done for us.
wait;1000
transition;close;1000
multi_remove_portrait;MC;Senya;Schuri
change_background;InsideCastle
transition;open
multi_add_portrait;MC;Left;Schuri;MidRight;Senya;FarRight
speak;MC;Whew! After everthing's that happened we all deserve a break!
speak;Senya;We haven't taken a break in awhile huh?|We finally cleaned up this place. It's such a huge place.
speak;Schuri;Hey why don't we turn this place into a school?|I was thinking we could pass down Sir's teachings...|So in way he would continue to live on.
bop_portrait;Senya
speak;Senya;Sure!|We'll definitely be the best school ever!|It can also help those who normally can't afford education.|Just like how he helped all of us.
speak;MC;With the three of us here, we can all make up for each of our's weaknesses.
speak;;Slowly, we eventually transformed Kaerndal Castle into a place of learning.|Our renown has steadily increased, becoming a place known for its close knit environment.|We couldn't be any happier passing down our late mentor's teachings.;;;narration_top
music_fade_back;2000
music;goldenEndingTheme
transition;close;2500
remove_portrait;MC
#ending cg?
change_background;default_background
